content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities before attempting to connect pipes.
- Make sure to specify the correct positions of the entities when connecting pipes.
- Verify that the fluid system is not full before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the burner inserter has enough fuel before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the burner inserter is placed correctly and has a clear path to the chest.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
- Make sure to specify the correct position of the entity when placing it.
